title: Congratulations to the OPL Split 2 champions!

replies.body: Damn i was there going 4 legacy ;( {{champion:32}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

Not sure what was going on with legacy, but this 'no lane swap' meta meant Carbon looked completely off. Not sure it was a great Chiefs, but more an 'out-of-sorts' Legacy. Was a great atmosphere last night, but the quality of the games could have been better.

Hope Legacy can bounce back!
Shame the game was so one-sided, with Carbon really lacking. But was still great to see Sp00kz going nuts. Also gotta give it to Rito for the venue, really well done and great atmosphere!
3k viewers on twitch stream for the OPL final lol...what a disgrace
who watches twitch?

Would have been IWC teams and the people who were involved eg players from teams, even organizers. If anything riot could have just paid for false viewers just to heavily promote the stream. I dont think their publicity team did a good job at all. They had several things they could have done but they didnt.
it was 4k at one point though so i guess thats a bit of a +
Shows that no-one really cares about OCE :/
Had a fun time at highpoint{{champion:163}}
i was wearing a poro hat lol
#CHFWIN
games are not even uploaded to youtube.. no one cares about OCE xD
Uploaded 4 days ago. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VtoCf4UbZN0

i was hoping legacy would win... but they made it this far so i'm proud :D
was kinda confused most of the time with legacy's choices... oh well.
I was there!
Carbon was tilted so hard last night, went and saw the game, it was a gg overall and at the end of the day LGC still the second best team so gg boys
Weow
lol{{champion:103}}
My Chief boys never disappoint. What superstars.

pfftt legacy coughed it again aye, opl is so boring i don't even need to watch it to know how the ladder is gonna end up. Chiefs u have had your turn on the world stage several times now, i think it's time you just retire.
I got upgraded a ward skin in the hextech crafting system but never got the ward skin?
